properties.description: Send an email notification with the regulatory compliance assessment details. Note: automated running of this trigger requires enabling automation in Azure Security Center
properties.displayName: Get a notification email when Security Center creates a regulatory compliance assessment (Preview)

body.Subject: New Azure Security Center regulatory compliance assessment has been created for your environment
body.Body:
Azure Security Center regulatory compliance assessment has been created for your environment - assessment details below:

Assessment Id: @{triggerBody()?['id']}

Assessment name: @{triggerBody()?['name']}

Resource provider type: @{triggerBody()?['type']}

Assessment description: @{triggerBody()?['properties']?['description']}

Assessment type: @{triggerBody()?['properties']?['assessmentType']}

Assessment state: @{triggerBody()?['properties']?['state']}

Assessment's related resources count with passed state: @{triggerBody()?['properties']?['passedResources']}

Assessment's related resources count with failed state:  @{triggerBody()?['properties']?['failedResources']}

Assessment's related resources count with skipped state:  @{triggerBody()?['properties']?['skippedResources']}

Link to more detailed assessment results data: @{triggerBody()?['properties']?['assessmentDetailsLink']}

Powered by Azure Security Center Logic Apps regulatory compliance connector.
